INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat(
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  s.scoring_group_id  ,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t , ch_fss.scoring_group s
WHERE s.account_id  = t.share_id
  and t.transaction_date >= '2020-01-01'::date
  AND t.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY s.scoring_group_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_type_code_id

INSERT INTO ch_fss.account_group_financial_stat (
  scoring_group_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  sg.scoring_group_id,
  4 AS financial_stat_type_code_id,      -- replace with the actual code as needed
  t.transaction_date AS date,
  t.balance AS value
FROM ch_fss.scoring_group sg
JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (share_id, transaction_date)
        share_id,
        transaction_date,
        balance,
        transaction_id
    FROM ch_fss.transaction aa
    ORDER BY share_id, transaction_date, transaction_id DESC
) t ON sg.account_id = t.share_id
WHERE sg.group_type_code_id = 1
